document.full_text: security forces killed six people in demonstrations across syria on friday calling for an end to autocratic rule, rights campaigners said, after the government promised to hold a "national dialogue" in the coming days.
document.title: syrian forces kill 6 protesters
lines_and_colors: security forces killed six people in demonstrations across syria on friday calling for an end to autocratic rule, rights campaigners said, after the government promised to hold a "national dialogue" in the coming days.
